item.title: Beside
item.description: One interesting aspect in this project was the use of a video on the home page which continues to run behind each main sections of the website. Sorry, you don't have HTML5 video and we didn't catch this properly in javascript. You can try to view the gif directly: https://zippy.gfycat.com/PiercingEverlastingDodobird.gif.
